title: Thirteen Steps Down
overview:
Mix Cellini is a lonely young man who is employed by a company that 
repairs exercise equipment. He lives in a flat of an old Victorian house
 in Notting Hill. His reclusive landlady, Gwendoline Chawcer, spends her
 time reading and thinking about lost loves. Mix becomes obsessed with 
serial killer John Christie and a local model, Nerissa Nash, despite the
 fact that she never acknowledges his existence.
